about_the_game:
LOCAL MULTIPLAYER

A couch multiplayer for up to 4 players. Play fast rounds where you must hit the ball and push your animal friends off the stage. Perfect for bringing fun to parties!

EASY TO LEARN, HARD TO MASTER

Only a joystick and a button are needed to smash your enemies, but that doesn’t mean it’s easy to master the batting of the dangerous ball…

Avoid enemy bats and hit the ball accurately until you are the last one standing to become a Michiball superstar!

CUSTOM MODS, CHARACTERS AND MAPS

Not only will you be able to play on a wide variety of maps or with numerous cute characters. You will also be able to add custom mods to let your creativity fly and share your creations with the community. Are you ready to showcase your talent?

TEAM OR SOLO GAME MODES

Team up and play different game modes designed to spend hours of diverse amusement!

WIDE COMPATIBILITY

Play on Linux, Steam Deck and Wide Screens too. Thanks to its low specs, Michiball can run almost in a toaster.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution that supports Steam
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, or AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux distribution that supports Steam
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K, or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, Support for OpenGL 4.6
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Michiball is a local multiplayer party video game, about a fictional sport that mixes baseball and dodgeball. Push your friends out of the ring, and be the last one standing to win! Discover new arenas, unique game modes, and play as cute pets.
